CRC and Rolling Counter Configuration

The CRC and Rolling Counter custom device allows the user to easily select data channels for calculating a CRC. It creates and maps rolling counters and CRC channels to selected outgoing signals.

What do you want to do?

Add A Frame Configuration

To add a frame configuration, right click on the add-on instance and select Add Configuration from the shortcut menu. Do this as many times as you need configurations.

Disable Add-on

To disable this add-on, right click on the add-on instance and select Disable from the shortcut menu.

Delete multiple items

To delete multiple items, right-click the object in the configuration tree and select Delete Multiple Items from the shortcut menu.
